intro: If you need to rest, take a break.||When you're ready to continue, tab the button labeled “Continue.”

Next, walk for two minutes as quickly as you safely can.||As before,||^• Tap the Continue button for a countdown.|^• Keep the phone in hand or side pocket.|^• Start walking at the signal.||When time is up, the app will sound a horn.
